title: Me&You logo font
content:
Anybody know what font is used for the Me&You logo.  
It is also used for all the song titles, so I am pretty sure it is a font.

[http://www.dustygroove.com/images/products/m/meyou~~~~~~\_floatingh\_101b....](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134438/http:/www.dustygroove.com/images/products/m/meyou~~~~~~_floatingh_101b.jpg "http://www.dustygroove.com/images/products/m/meyou ~~~~~~ \_floatingh\_101b.jpg")

// Mark

 [‹ Sega Dreamcast logo.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134438/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40291 "Go to previous forum topic") [Andy Warhol classic Campbell's Soup painting ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134438/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40277 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Lubalin

comments.content: Something like [Gusto Highlight](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134438/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/device_fonts/gusto_highlight/) or [Frankfurter Highlight](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134438/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/frankfurter_highlight/). For a little more wonkiness, go [Arbuckle Bright](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134438/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/garagefonts/arbuckle_bright/).

Thx. Stephen.  
All good suggestions, but not quite it.  
Anyone else?
Yup. I don’t think this is a font available to the general public.
